Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game
  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    To play this game, create an instance of this class and call the "play" method. This main class creates and initialises all the others: it creates all rooms, creates the parser and starts the game. It also evaluates and executes the commands that the parser returns.
    Version:
    2016.02.29

      • play

        public void play()
        Main play routine. Loops until end of play.

      • useItem

        public void useItem​(java.lang.String item)
        Use command. If the player is able to use an item from their inventory, do so. There are only 4 use cases: Pillow in Spike Room Key in Locked Door Room Cube in Button Room Sword in Dragon Room

      • lookAt

        public void lookAt​(java.lang.String target)
        Look command. Gives player information about an room, item, or their inventory.

      • takeItem

        public void takeItem​(java.lang.String target)
        Takes an item out of a room and adds it into the player's inventory.
